page.title: 13Technology in Leafield.
page.content: Many people have lawn mowers,electric kettles,Hoovers and cookers. Very few people have waffle makers,fans,metal detectors,slow cookers and electric polishers. Most people have a radio,camera,T.V, and calculator. Surprisingly few people have a computer,video or hi-fi.Only 10 people out of 40 have a computer. Most people heat their homes with electricity or solid fuel. There are only 5 homes that are heated by oil. The Radio Station. This was started in 1926.It is still being used but they are clearing the transmitters out of the wings to make bedrooms for the students at the college.Several radio stations are being closed and some of the workers are moving to Stow-on-the-Wold.
